APIAccessAll.name: APIAccessAll
APIAccessAll.description: Grant permission to all the supported Opensearch APIs

BatchGetCollection.name: BatchGetCollection
BatchGetCollection.description: Grants permission to get attributes for one or more collections

BatchGetEffectiveLifecyclePolicy.name: BatchGetEffectiveLifecyclePolicy
BatchGetEffectiveLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to get the information about a lifecycle policy applied to one or more AOSS resources

BatchGetLifecyclePolicy.name: BatchGetLifecyclePolicy
BatchGetLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more lifecycle policies

BatchGetVpcEndpoint.name: BatchGetVpcEndpoint
BatchGetVpcEndpoint.description: Grants permission to get attributes for one or more VPC endpoints

CreateAccessPolicy.name: CreateAccessPolicy
CreateAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to create a data access policy

CreateCollection.name: CreateCollection
CreateCollection.description: Grants permission to create a serverless collection

CreateLifecyclePolicy.name: CreateLifecyclePolicy
CreateLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to create a lifecycle policy

CreateSecurityConfig.name: CreateSecurityConfig
CreateSecurityConfig.description: Grants permission to create a serverless security configuration

CreateSecurityPolicy.name: CreateSecurityPolicy
CreateSecurityPolicy.description: Grants permission to create a network or encryption policy

CreateVpcEndpoint.name: CreateVpcEndpoint
CreateVpcEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch-Serverless-managed interface VPC endpoint

DashboardsAccessAll.name: DashboardsAccessAll
DashboardsAccessAll.description: Grants permission to Opensearch Serverless Dashboards

DeleteAccessPolicy.name: DeleteAccessPolicy
DeleteAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a data access policy

DeleteCollection.name: DeleteCollection
DeleteCollection.description: Grants permission to delete a serverless collection

DeleteLifecyclePolicy.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
DeleteLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a lifecycle policy

DeleteSecurityConfig.name: DeleteSecurityConfig
DeleteSecurityConfig.description: Grants permission to delete a security configuration

DeleteSecurityPolicy.name: DeleteSecurityPolicy
DeleteSecurityPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a security policy

DeleteVpcEndpoint.name: DeleteVpcEndpoint
DeleteVpcEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Serverless-managed interface VPC endpoint

GetAccessPolicy.name: GetAccessPolicy
GetAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to get information about a data access policy

GetAccountSettings.name: GetAccountSettings
GetAccountSettings.description: Grants permission to get account settings, including capacity settings

GetPoliciesStats.name: GetPoliciesStats
GetPoliciesStats.description: Grants permission to get statistis about the security policies in your account

GetSecurityConfig.name: GetSecurityConfig
GetSecurityConfig.description: Grants permission to get information about a serverless security configuration

GetSecurityPolicy.name: GetSecurityPolicy
GetSecurityPolicy.description: Grants permission to get information about a security policy

ListAccessPolicies.name: ListAccessPolicies
ListAccessPolicies.description: Grants permission to list data access policies

ListLifecyclePolicies.name: ListLifecyclePolicies
ListLifecyclePolicies.description: Grants permission to list lifecycle policies

ListSecurityConfigs.name: ListSecurityConfigs
ListSecurityConfigs.description: Grants permission to list security configurations

ListSecurityPolicies.name: ListSecurityPolicies
ListSecurityPolicies.description: Grants permission to list security policies

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a collection

ListVpcEndpoints.name: ListVpcEndpoints
ListVpcEndpoints.description: Grants permission to list OpenSearch Serverless-managed VPC endpoints

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a serverless collection

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a collection

UpdateAccessPolicy.name: UpdateAccessPolicy
UpdateAccessPolicy.description: Grants permission to update a data access policy

UpdateAccountSettings.name: UpdateAccountSettings
UpdateAccountSettings.description: Grants permission to update account settings, including capacity settings

UpdateCollection.name: UpdateCollection
UpdateCollection.description: Grants permission to update a collection

UpdateLifecyclePolicy.name: UpdateLifecyclePolicy
UpdateLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to update a lifecycle policy

UpdateSecurityConfig.name: UpdateSecurityConfig
UpdateSecurityConfig.description: Grants permission to update a security configuration

UpdateSecurityPolicy.name: UpdateSecurityPolicy
UpdateSecurityPolicy.description: Grants permission to update a security policy

UpdateVpcEndpoint.name: UpdateVpcEndpoint
UpdateVpcEndpoint.description: Grants permission to update an OpenSearch Serverless-managed VPC endpoint
